text: Hum ney dozakh kay daroghy say farishtay rakhein hein aur hum ney unki tadad sirf kafiron ki azmaish kay liye mukarrar ki hay takay ahl e kitab yaqeen ker lein.aur ahl e eman kay eman mein asafa ho jay aur ahl e kitab aur ahl e eman shak na kerien aur jin kay dilon mein bimari hay wo aur kafir kahein kay is biyan say Allah Talah jissy chata hay ghumrah kerta hay aur jissy chata hay hidayat dyta hay tery rab kay lashkaron ko us kay siwa koi nahi janta yeh to kul bani adam kay liye sar a sar pind o nasehat hay
